tp:treatment-sec.p: †Auchenosteidae Jaekel 1911: 48 (family) † Auchenosteus Jaekel 1919 [no valid type genus, not available, Art. 11.7.1.1]

†Brachydiridae Gross 1932: 34 (family) † Brachydeirus Koenen 1880 [ type genus as †
Brachydirus
, name must be corrected Art. 32.5.3; corrected to † Brachydeiridae by Fowler 1947: 6 , confirmed by Fowler 1965b: 378 ]
